metadata.title: CVE-2024-26770 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:HID: nvidia-shield: Add missing null pointer checks to LED initializationdevm_kasprintf() returns a pointer to dynamically allocated memorywhich can be NULL upon failure. Ensure the allocation was successfulby checking the pointer validity.[jkosina@suse.com: tweak changelog a bit]

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
